feature.label: KNIME Remote Workflow Control (experimental)
feature.description: This features enables control of jobs that are currently executing on a server. This feature and the contained plug-ins are the intellectual property of KNIME AG, Zurich, Switzerland. This plug-in is not part of the Open Source KNIME Platform. It is not released under GPL, like most parts of KNIME. It is available at no charge and it can be used without restrictions. It is provided "as is", without any warranty.
